name: Game Jam (CodeYeti)
description:
The theme of the game is developing a game for a gam jam.  To play you hit the key that matches what the icon of what the game needs.

A = Art
S = Code
D = Music
( or see screen shot for how to play guide).

Hit the right button as the icon passes the middle of the bar, miss and you'll create bugs and get angry! when you can take it anymore you'll give up and release whatever it is you've made.

Happy game jamming!

Made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 1
